name: lawyer
description: Lawyers Egypt Digital - Law Office Management App

scripts.build-both: npm run build-modern && npm run build-legacy
scripts.pack-law: if exist "law" rmdir /s /q "law" && electron-packager . law --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=. --overwrite --asar=true --executable-name=lawyer --app-bundle-id=com.lawyers.egypt.digital --app-version=1.0.0 --build-version=1.0.0 --appCopyright="Ahmad - Egypt" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Lawyers Egypt Digital" --win32metadata.ProductName="lawyer" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Law Office Management App" && if exist "law-win32-x64" ren "law-win32-x64" "law"
scripts.pack-law-32: if exist "law-32" rmdir /s /q "law-32" && electron-packager . law-32 --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --out=. --overwrite --asar=true --executable-name=lawyer --app-bundle-id=com.lawyers.egypt.digital --app-version=1.0.0 --build-version=1.0.0 --appCopyright="Ahmad - Egypt" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Lawyers Egypt Digital" --win32metadata.ProductName="lawyer" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Law Office Management App" && if exist "law-32-win32-ia32" ren "law-32-win32-ia32" "law-32"

author: Ahmad - Egypt
